DOC.detailed_description: A randomized cross-over study conduct use telesonography system transmit ultrasound image display ultrasound monitor ( ultrasound sequence video ) image show practitioner 's operation ( background video ) smartphone without interruption motion Long Term Evolution ( LTE ) network . Thirty novice practitioner randomly assign two group . The subject group A ( n=15 ) perform ultrasonography identification appendix mentor onsite expert , whereas group B ( n=15 ) perform procedure mentor offsite expert . Each subject perform procedure three simulate patient . After four-week interval , perform procedure type mentoring . A total 90 ultrasound examination perform scenario . The primary outcome success rate identify appendix time require identify appendix .
